about_the_game:
Hearsay


Legend has it that in ancient times, Gonggong was defeated by Zhurong, in a fit of rage, he damaged Buzhou Mountain with a great smash, the pillar holding up the heaven. The mountain broken, followed by great flood and suffering. Nüwa could not bear the loss of life, she gathered and melted stones to mend the sky. But in the mending, there were four remaining magic Sparks with fire, thunder, cold, poison powers created and scattered all directions on the earth. 

Among them, Fire Spark was scattered to West Pasha Kingdom, Thunder Spark to Great Grassland, Cold Spark to Kunlun Mountains and Poison Spark to South Jiange. Four Sparks, Varied magics, If gathered, Power beyond. So for a long time, bold strifes and cunning struggles have endlessly taken place in order to get them.

Nowadays


Early years of the Tang dynasty, Yuwen Jingzhe and his fellow Kunlun Sect apprentices practiced swordsmanship and techniques among the snow-capped mountains in Kunlun Mountains of the Western Regions. The arrival of MangZi, a small witch of the Moonwatcher clan in NanZhao, broke the tranquility of the mountains.

It turned out that during the Mid-autumn Festival, there was a strange phenomenon in the sky, Blood Moon befell, soon a commotion in the northwest boundary of Moon Ward was noticed by Shadowmoon master in the clan through the sacrifice ritual, urgently the disciples was ordered to go to Kunlun Sect to ask for its head Taiyan Zhenren's help on the crisis.

Then, at the request of Taiyan Zhenren, the head disciple, Yuwen Jingzhe tidied up his belongs, bid farewell to the sect, and went downhill with the little witch MangZi, looking to pacifying the increasing unease of Moon Ward boundary.

Why the eternally untouchable boundary has been stirred up? Is it the act of nature or man? Could Yuwen Jingzhe manage to help MangZi to finish the job? What kind of underworld would Kunlun disciples encounter? Welcome to experience the real-time combat RPG game“Tales of Spark", let's join the adventure!

Main Features


Travel in the Desert - You can adventure in the desert where the game story takes place. In addition to the big map, the game contains 5 large dungeons and 10 small underground palaces.

Build Your Hero - The game currently provides 1 hero with 20 skills and 30 talents, you can choose freely as you wish to build your hero to maximize your abilities

The Road is Rough - Along the way, you will encounter more than 50 different monsters and elite enhanced versions of these monsters, in addition, you will also challenge more than a dozen powerful bosses.

Fighting for Justice - As you become stronger and stronger, more and more people will need your help, the game has a main quest throughout and a dozen side quests.

Collect Treasure - As you continue your journey, defeating dangerous enemies, you'll gain a steady stream of gear and items. In addition to the ever-changing random equipment, there are more than 80 pieces of exquisite and powerful ancient equipment, as well as a large number of jade and consumables.

Jade Echoes - Some equipment has 1 or more slots, you can insert jade stone into it to enhance the equipment, if you insert it in a certain order, you can get unparalleled Jade Echoes equipment.

Contact us

iceandfireisle@outlook.com

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/Windows8/Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K, 3.4GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 2200G, 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum System Requirements might change in the future
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7/Windows8/Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K, 3.9 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X, 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 580, 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended System Requirements might change in the future

short_description: In“Tales of Spark”, the player will play as a young hero, travel in the desert, search for treasure, and unveil the layers of conspiracy over mysterious organizations. It's a classic retro RPG with tons of dialogue, explorable maps, gear, and treasure.
